appMessage.body:
Have you had coronavirus (COVID-19)? 

The NHS urgently needs blood plasma donations. It could save lives and be an important treatment during a second wave of infection.

We especially need men to donate. This includes men who have had coronavirus symptoms but no test.

To find out more about donating blood plasma and how to help, go to https://www.nhsbt.nhs.uk/who-can-donate-plasma
